sentence.text: Intrauterine growth retardation was noticed during pregnancy.
He had asphyxia neonatorum after birth, and his birth length was 43 cm and birth weight 3100 g.
Gesell Developmental Test revealed a severe developmental delay (Motor: moderate; Language: low normal; Adaptive: severe; Personal-social: severe).
Distinctive facial features included macrocephaly (HC = 52 cm, + 3SD), Triangular face, presence of lower eyelid fat pads, pointed chin, wide palpebral fissures, upturned nose and low nasal bridge.
Skeletal finding included pectus carinatum and pes planus.
His results of intelligence and endocrine evaluation were normal.
